    • logModelHTTLLongerThanGlobalConfiguration

      public void logModelHTTLLongerThanGlobalConfiguration(String definitionKey)
      Method for logging message when model TTL longer than global TTL.
      Parameters:
      definitionKey - the correlated definition key with which history TTL is related to. For processes related to httl, that is the processDefinitionKey, for cases the case definition key whereas for decisions is the decision definition key.
